title: Ohio ad campaign targets Seattle ‘tech bros’ — questions why someone would want to stay in a big coastal city - GeekWire
content: Ohio ad campaign targets Seattle ‘tech bros’ — questions why someone would want to stay in a big coastal city  GeekWire
description: The State of Ohio really wants Seattleites to move to the Buckeye state — even the tech bros. A new ad campaign from JobsOhio airing during the March Madness basketball tournament specifically targets…
